title: ﻿﻿﻿﻿The Adventures of Zz'rot portal Garen
body:
Check out my zzrot portal garen video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g0nFDHILtqk

Feedback would be appreciated

replies.body: He gets rot portal after the 12 min mark for those who don't wanna watch the whole thing.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=2NN60Oue,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-27T11:32:44.849+0000)
>
> He gets rot portal after the 12 min mark for those who don't wanna watch the whole thing.

im planning to make a montage soon
so it doesn't have to be 30 mins long 

2-5 mins is what im aiming for 

but that'll take a while to get the clips
Oh no don't get me wrong I didn't mind watching it maybe a bad item to build against Renekton as he is ad more maybe against rumble or Irelia or an AP enemy, but anyway good game play.
